alert.note: Alert for Elmore (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 8:18AM CST until January 09 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: .Heavy rainfall has produced some localized flooding in and around the Prattville area. Use caution will traveling this morning. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Autauga and Elmore. * WHEN...Until 1115 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 813 AM CST, the public reported flooding in the advisory area. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some flooding around the Candlestick Mobile Home Park and Highway 31 is occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Prattville.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
